mapper.insert: INSERT INTO player(NAME, teamId, position, createdAt) VALUES(#{name}, #{teamId}, #{position}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.id) AS rownum, p.id id, t.name teamName, p.position position, p.name name, p.createdAt createdAt FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id WHERE isExpelled = 0
SELECT POSITION, MAX(if(teamId = 1, NAME, "")) lotte, MAX(if(teamId = 2, NAME, "")) lg, MAX(if(teamId = 3, NAME, "")) kiwoom FROM player GROUP BY POSITION
mapper.update: UPDATE player SET isExpelled = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
